scripts.ci:guard: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');const files=cp.execSync('git ls-files | grep -E \'\\.(ts|tsx)$\'',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim().split('\n');let bad=[];for(const f of files){const s=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(/\"use client\"|\'use client\'/.test(s)&&/export const metadata/.test(s))bad.push(f);}if(bad.length){console.error('Bad files:',bad.join('\n'));process.exit(1);}console.log('Guard OK');"
